Entries.Introduction: The others are a bit wary of humans, but I think you seem pretty nice.$0#$b#I'm Lilia, by the way.$0
Entries.Mon: The island is pretty no matter what time of year it is.$0
Entries.Wed: I really think we should start a garden somewhere in the village.$0#$b#That would be so lovely.$0
Entries.Thu: I love the sea plants that grow on this island.$0#$b#It takes all of my strength to avoid gathering them all up!$0
Entries.Fri: Raindrops on roses and whiskers on kittens~.$1
Entries.Sat: I wonder what your town is like.$0#$b#I hope everyone there is nice to you!$0
Entries.Sun: It's a good day for rest~.$0
